entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`uuid` TEXT NOT NULL, `title` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`uuid`))

indices.name: index_category_title
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_category_title` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`title`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`uuid` TEXT NOT NULL, `title` TEXT, `amount` REAL NOT NULL, `category_uuid` TEXT NOT NULL, `created` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`uuid`), FOREIGN KEY(`category_uuid`) REFERENCES `category`(`uuid`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_expense_category_uuid
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_expense_category_uuid` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`category_uuid`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `title` TEXT NOT NULL, `start` INTEGER, `finish` INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `value` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT (
                CASE title
                    WHEN 'Year' THEN unixepoch('now', 'start of year')
                    WHEN 'Custom' THEN unixepoch(CAST(date_filter.start/1000 AS INT), 'unixepoch', 'start of day')
                    WHEN 'Any' THEN 0
                    ELSE unixepoch('now', 'start of month')
                END
            ) as start, 
            (
                CASE title
                    WHEN 'Year' THEN unixepoch('now', 'start of year', '+1 years', '-1 seconds')
                    WHEN 'Custom' THEN unixepoch(CAST(date_filter.finish/1000 AS INT), 'unixepoch','start of day' ,'+1 days', '-1 seconds')
                    WHEN 'Any' THEN 9223372036854775807
                    ELSE unixepoch('now', 'start of month', '+1 months', '-1 seconds')
                END
            ) as finish 
            FROM date_filter
         UNION   
         SELECT unixepoch('now', 'start of month') as start,
            unixepoch('now', 'start of month', '+1 months', '-1 seconds') as finish 
         FROM (
            SELECT COUNT(id) as date_filters_count
            FROM date_filter
        ) 
        WHERE date_filters_count == 0
